features.name: SaaS Admin Dashboard
features.description: Professional admin dashboard with collapsible sidebar, sticky header, and responsive card grid for managing organizations and content.

features.name: QBank Creator Dashboard
features.description: Advanced interface for creating and managing question banks, including AI generation, bulk upload, and smart filtering.

features.name: Gemini AI Integration
features.description: Service for generating educational content and questions using Google's Gemini AI models.

features.name: Bulk Content Upload
features.description: Service and UI for importing large datasets from CSV, Excel, and JSON files.

features.name: Markdown Editor
features.description: Rich text editor with live preview for creating chapter content and notes.
